attribute.name: conf
attribute.description: The config name passed in as the -c option to jboss

attribute.name: host
attribute.description: The hostname/address passed in as the -b option to jboss

attribute.name: jvmargs
attribute.description: An additional jvmarg line set after any ${jpda.cmdline}

echo.message: Will start the jboss instance @{host} with @{conf}, dist=@{jboss.dist}

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: The jndi provider url used to lookup the RMIAdaptor

echo.message: Will stop the jboss instance at url @{url}
If you need apache to run on port 80, then
you need to start apache with admin/root rights.
If so, start/stop apache independent of this testsuite

macrodef.name: create-bootstrapdependencies-config
macrodef.description: Create a configuration based on the 'all' profile with bootstrap dependencies test's SAR

macrodef.name: create-profileservice-config
macrodef.description: Create a configuration with the full features profile service

macrodef.name: create-springdeployer-config
macrodef.description: Create a configuration with the springdeployer

macrodef.name: create-config
macrodef.description: Create new config based on an existing config

attribute.name: baseconf
attribute.description: The base config to start with

attribute.name: newconf
attribute.description: The name of the new config

attribute.name: newconf-src
attribute.description: The name of the tests-config to copy or the baseconf

echo.message: Giving a name to the Tomcat instance under ${jboss.dist}/server/@{conf}

macrodef.name: run-junit
macrodef.description: Run a batch of junit on the given patternset

attribute.name: junit.patternset
attribute.description: The patternset used to select the tests to run

attribute.name: junit.configuration
attribute.description: An optional configuration name added to the test and extention

attribute.name: junit.syspropertyset
attribute.description: An optional propertyset id that will be passed as system properties

echo.message: The project fragment which defines the jboss server configs
